chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
B: lattice
A: lattice
s: Pred (A * B)
p: (A * B)%type

Goal:
(forall q : A * B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> pair_sup s <== p

Premises:
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
pair_sup = fun s : Pred (A * B) => (sup [Pred p | exists f : A * B, p = f.1 /\ f \In s], sup [Pred p | exists f : A * B, p = f.2 /\ f \In s]) : Pred (A * B) -> A * B
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
pair_supP : forall (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), p \In s -> p <== pair_sup s
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [A : lattice B : lattice s : Pred (A * B) p : A * B |- Type] ?T' : [A : lattice B : lattice s : Pred (A * B) p : A * B |- Type] ?f : [A : lattice B : lattice s : Pred (A * B) p : A * B |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [A : lattice B : lattice s : Pred (A * B) p : A * B |- ?T'] ?s : [A : lattice B : lattice s : Pred (A * B) p : A * B |- seq ?T]
prod_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A * B -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (b : B), P (a, b)) -> forall p : A * B, P p
prod_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A * B -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (b : B), P (a, b)) -> forall p : A * B, P p
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
Relation_Operators.symprod_ind : forall (A B : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (leB : B -> B -> Prop) (P : A * B -> A * B -> Prop), (forall x x' : A, leA x x' -> forall y : B, P (x, y) (x', y)) -> (forall y y' : B, leB y y' -> forall x : A, P (x, y) (x, y')) -> forall p p0 : A * B, Relation_Operators.symprod A B leA leB p p0 -> P p p0
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
subp_orr : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> PredU q p1 <=p PredU q p2
subp_orl : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> PredU p1 q <=p PredU p2 q
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
subp_or : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p q /\ p2 <=p q < -> PredU p1 p2 <=p q
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
BinPosDef.Pos.sub_mask = fix sub_mask (x y : BinNums.positive) {struct y} : BinPosDef.Pos.mask := match x with | BinNums.xI p => match y with | BinNums.xI q => BinPosDef.Pos.double_mask (sub_mask p q) | BinNums.xO q => BinPosDef.Pos.succ_double_mask (sub_mask p q) | BinNums.xH => BinPosDef.Pos.IsPos (BinNums.xO p) end | BinNums.xO p => match y with | BinNums.xI q => BinPosDef.Pos.succ_double_mask (sub_mask_carry p q) | BinNums.xO q => BinPosDef.Pos.double_mask (sub_mask p q) | BinNums.xH => BinPosDef.Pos.IsPos (BinPosDef.Pos.pred_double p) end | BinNums.xH => match y with | BinNums.xH => BinPosDef.Pos.IsNul | _ => BinPosDef.Pos.IsNeg end...
subp_and : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), q <=p p1 /\ q <=p p2 < -> q <=p (fun x : T => p1 x /\ p2 x)
subp_andl : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> (fun x : T => p1 x /\ q x) <=p (fun x : T => p2 x /\ q x)
subp_andr : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> (fun x : T => q x /\ p1 x) <=p (fun x : T => q x /\ p2 x)
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
InE : forall T : Type, (forall x y : T, x \In [:: y] <-> x = y) * (forall (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s <-> x = y \/ x \In s) * (forall (T0 : Type) (x : T0) (p : Simpl_Pred T0), (x \In p) = p x)
infP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), x \In s -> inf s <== x
List.split : forall A B : Type, seq (A * B) -> seq A * seq B
prod_curry = fun (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B -> C) (p : A * B) => let (x, y) := p in f x y : forall A B C : Type, (A -> B -> C) -> A * B -> C Arguments prod_curry {A B C}%type_scope _%function_scope
List.partition : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> seq A -> seq A * seq A
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
relaxP : forall (T : poset) (P1 P2 : T), P1 <== P2 -> forall p : T, p <== P1 -> p <== P2
Fix_F_2 : forall (A B : Type) (R : A * B -> A * B -> Prop) (P : A -> B -> Type), (forall (x : A) (x' : B), (forall (y : A) (y' : B), R (y, y') (x, x') -> P y y') -> P x x') -> forall (x : A) (x' : B), Acc R (x, x') -> P x x'
Inductive symprod (A B : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (leB : B -> B -> Prop) : A * B -> A * B -> Prop := left_sym : forall x x' : A, leA x x' -> forall y : B, Relation_Operators.symprod A B leA leB (x, y) (x', y) | right_sym : forall y y' : B, leB y y' -> forall x : A, Relation_Operators.symprod A B leA leB (x, y) (x, y') Arguments Relation_Operators.symprod (_ _)%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.left_sym (_ _)%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.right_sym (_ _)%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
pair_leq : forall A B : poset, A * B -> A * B -> Prop
sub_supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (C : sup_closed s) (u : Pred (subPoset s)) (x : subPoset s), (forall y : subPoset s, y \In u -> y <== x) -> sub_sup C u <== x
nth_zip_cond : forall (S0 T : Type) (p : S0 * T) (s : seq S0) (t : seq T) (i : nat), nth p (zip s t) i = (if i < size (zip s t) then (nth p.1 s i, nth p.2 t i) else p)

```coq
```coq
intros H.
apply pair_supP.
unfold pair_sup.
destruct H as [H1 H2].
rewrite supM.
apply supM.
unfold sup.
intros y H3.
apply supP.
apply H2.
Qed.```
